items.label: Content and visual guidelines for Hiver Knowledge Base

getting-started/Content-and-visual-guide.title: Content and visual guidelines for Hiver Knowledge Base

getting-started/create-a-shared-mailbox.title: Create a Shared Mailbox
getting-started/create-a-shared-mailbox.description: A shared mailbox is like a central container for emails sent to a specific address, like support@company.com. Teammates who are added to the mailbox can see, reply to, add notes, and manage emails.

getting-started/getting-started-with-hiv.title: Getting started with Hiver for Gmail
getting-started/getting-started-with-hiv.description: Hiver lets your team manage customer support emails directly from Gmail without sharing login credentials. Your teammates can see messages, reply from the shared address, assign conversations to teammates, leave notes for context, and more.
